mapper.select: SELECT question_id as qid, user_id as uid, title as title, content as content, time as time, state as state FROM question Where state !=2
SELECT question_id as qid, user_id as uid, title as title, content as content, time as time, state as state FROM question Where question_id=#{qid}

SELECT b.question_id as qid, b.user_id as uid, b.title as title, b.content as content, b.time as time, b.state as state, a.avater as user_avater, a.nickname as user_name FROM user a, question b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id and a.user_id in( SELECT u.user_id as id FROM follow_user f, user u WHERE f.user_id = #{userid} and f.user_followed_id = u.user_id ) ORDER BY b.time DESC;

SELECT b.question_id AS qid, b.user_id AS uid, b.title AS title, b.content AS content, b.time AS time, b.state AS state, a.avater AS user_avater, a.nickname AS user_name FROM USER a, question b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND b.question_id IN ( SELECT f.question_followed_id AS id FROM follow_quesion f WHERE f.user_id = #{userid} ) ORDER BY time DESC;

SELECT q.question_id AS qid, q.user_id AS uid, q.title AS title, q.content AS content, q.time AS time, q.state AS state, u.nickname AS user_name, u.avater AS user_avater FROM question q, USER u WHERE q.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY time DESC;
